owen.gloss: Welsh industrialist and social reformer who founded cooperative communities (1771-1858)
English comparative anatomist and paleontologist who was an opponent of Darwinism (1804-1892)

owen glendower.gloss: Welsh chieftain who led a revolt against Henry IV's rule in Wales (1359-1416)

owens.gloss: United States athlete and Black American whose success in the 1936 Olympic Games in Berlin outraged Hitler (1913-1980)

owl.gloss: nocturnal bird of prey with hawk-like beak and claws and large head with front-facing eyes

owlclaws.gloss: stout perennial herb of western United States having flower heads with drooping orange-yellow rays

owlt.gloss: the elapsed time it takes for light (or radio signals) to travel between the Earth and a celestial object

owner.gloss: (law) someone who owns (is legal possessor of) a business

ownership.gloss: the act of having and controlling property

own.gloss: belonging to or on behalf of a specified person (especially yourself)

own up.gloss: admit or acknowledge a wrongdoing or error
